channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Splash Header
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Splash Header

item.title: CVE-2021-24587|2024-08-03T19:35:20.318Z -- unknown -- splash%20header
item.description: The Splash Header WordPress plugin before 1.20.8 doesn't sanitise and escape some of its settings while outputting them in the admin dashboard, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
